item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. If OpenSSL Were a GUI (49 points | 17 comments)
2. Purelymail: Cheap, no-nonsense email (133 points | 63 comments)
3. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (119 points | 22 comments)
4. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (101 points | 30 comments)
5. Show HN: Bagels – TUI Expense Tracker (16 points | discuss)
6. The leading AI models are now good historians (167 points | 125 comments)
7. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (229 points | 22 comments)
8. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (43 points | 15 comments)
9. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (75 points | 13 comments)
10. The protester's guide to smartphone security (339 points | 172 comments)
11. Interview with Andy Yen, CEO of Proton VPN (24 points | 6 comments)
12. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (153 points | 62 comments)
13. Kansas tuberculosis outbreak is now America's largest in recorded history (324 points | 234 comments)
14. Calif.-founded EV maker Canoo, once worth $2.4B, goes belly-up (10 points | 1 comment)
15. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (130 points | 33 comments)
16. It's Called a Premortem–and It's the Most Productive Thing You'll Do All Year (17 points | 13 comments)
17. Show HN: An innovative flag-guessing game that identify regions by fragments (3 points | 2 comments)
18. OpenJazz is a free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games (65 points | 8 comments)
19. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)
20. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (59 points | 8 comments)
21. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (188 points | 59 comments)
22. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (243 points | 95 comments)
23. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts after outcry from the users (43 points | 5 comments)
24. Dualities in Functional Programming (31 points | 4 comments)
25. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (114 points | 182 comments)
26. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (116 points | 64 comments)
27. When a hyperspectral image is a cube (4 points | discuss)
28. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (404 points | 277 comments)
29. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (359 points | 355 comments)
30. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (100 points | 20 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
